level.heading: Optional procedure.
level.text: The right of a judgment creditor to bring an action to enforce a judgment in lieu of proceeding under this subchapter remains unimpaired.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-173, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-351.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Enforcement of Foreign Judgments Act (1964). See 13 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
